name: Towing Muscle Brothers Inc: The Tow Truck Emergency 911 Rescue
name_original: Towing Muscle Brothers Inc: The Tow Truck Emergency 911 Rescue
description:
TOW TRUCK...DUTY IS CALLING!

Recently, Chantier son has joined the Muscle Brothers Towing Company so help him out to drive towing car and find those illegally parking cars on roads.

Also, there are many people who haven’t paid their bills and their cars need to be towed. So start looking for those cars that have lots of penalty tickets. Oh don’t forget to collect coins on your way, if you collect enough coins then you can unlock all 3 tow trucks.

*Also, on completion of level, you will get a chance to unlock new tow truck so keep playing.

DOWNLOAD TOWING MUSCLE BROTHERS for FREE now!

Reach The CHANTIER Family at: family@craquespotes.com
